mapper.select: select tu.user_id , tup.user_nm , tu.pwd , tu.authority , decode(tu.authority, 'ROLE_CP', '운수사', 'ROPE_SIGUN', '시군', 'ROLE_ADMIN', '시스템관리자') auth_nm , tup.org_cd , tup.comp_id , tu.last_pw_update_dt , case when tu.last_pw_update_dt is null THEN 'Y' when to_char(tu.last_pw_update_dt, 'YYYYMMDD') < to_char(add_months(sysdate, -3), 'YYYYMMDD') then 'Y' else 'N' end is_expired , tu.fail_count from tb_user tu inner join tb_user_profile tup on tu.user_id = tup.user_id where tu.user_id = #{userId} and tu.use_yn = 'Y'
select fail_count from tb_user where user_id = #{userId}
